---
title: "SURE 2025"
---

Welcome to the Summer Undergraduate Research Experience in Statistics (SURE) 2025, hosted by the Department of Statistics & Data Science at Carnegie Mellon University.
This program focuses on statistics and data science methodology with applications in healthcare and sports analytics.

On this site, the [Lectures](https://36-sure.github.io/2025/lectures.html) tab contains all lecture slides.
The [Health](https://36-sure.github.io/2025/health.html) and [Sports](https://36-sure.github.io/2025/sports.html) tabs contain materials for health and sports camps, respectively.
